attributes.action: Unite Ireland as whole, as we already suffered under British rule
attributes.background: Ireland spent several hundred years under British rule and suffered murder , slavery，and colonialism. We do not want to go back to these times. As a whole it would also make financial sense to unite.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the people of Ireland and Northern Ireland following a referendum, not the UK Parliament and Government. 

You could start a new petition about something that the UK Parliament and Government are responsible for. 

You might also like to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235299
